altText: Photo of two people, one with a backpack, taking a fall stroll along a paved trail strewn with leaves at the edges and lined with deciduous trees
Photo of three people on bicycles crossing a boardwalk bridge with log railings in a natural wetland setting of reeds, varied trees, and open sky
Photo of a wetland meadow with a diversity of wildflowers and other plants surrounded by a pine forest under an open sky
Photo of open pine forest clearing covered with various grasses, long-stemmed plants, and wildflowers under an open sky with clouds
Photo of a lone bicyclist viewed from a distance on a paved bike trail with trees in autumn foliage to either side and the forest canopy penetrated by numerous sunbeams
Photo of a bicycle rental office and service building with numerous trail bikes parked on either side of a long bike rack
Photo of a young woman, viewed from behind, wearing a white snowsuit and wool cap preparing to cross-country ski over a snow-covered trail
Photo of a narrow, leaf-covered trail with young white birch trees in autumn foliage to either side
Photo of two adult hikers with two children between them, all dressed in proper walking clothes and hats, on a forest trail with mature trees in spring-summer foliage to either side
Photo of a narrow hiking trail winding through mature trees in spring-summer foliage
Photo of a trailhead, with signage, surrounded by tall coniferous trees and shorter, younger deciduous trees in autumn foliage
Photo of a tree-lined forest path in autumn with a sign marking Deer Park Trail number 6 and a zigzag caution sign indicating a hilly trail
Photo of an inlet of Hernando DeSoto Lake with tufts of lake grass and wild swans surrounded by coniferous trees and deciduous trees in autumn foliage
Photo of a forested peninsula on Hernando DeSoto Lake in early morning mist with the prow of a canoe in the foreground
Photo of a trail skirting an inlet of a lake with tall pine trees and underbrush to either side of the trail and along the shore of the lake
Photo of a lake inlet surrounded by reeds, underbrush, and varied trees in autumn foliage; in the foreground, a young woman with a ponytail looks across the lake over the dead limbs of a fallen tree
Photo of a chimney-like Civilian Conservation Corps section marker made of cut and fitted stones of varied shapes and sizes on a Portland cement base in a forest setting
Photo of a wide, paved path with coniferous trees and deciduous trees in autumn foliage on either side and a trail marker sign indicating that the Mississippi River headwaters are 600 feet away
Photo of a snow-covered trail with a low, wooden post-and-rail barrier protecting an Indian mound and mature forest in the background
Photo of a narrow forest trail with green, spring-summer undergrowth and the trunks of mature pine trees to either side of the footpath
Photo of a wide trail in a varied forest setting leading to a huge white pine with a fenced-in boardwalk at the base of the tree
Photo of a fair-haired woman dressed in a gray coat and black gloves embracing a pine tree to show the wide girth of the trunk
Photo of a wide, unpaved trail with an interpretive sign in a varied forest clearing in spring-summer foliage
Photo of Mary Lake view from trail with pine trees surrounding the water that reflects glittering sunlight and a blue sky with clouds
Photo of McKay Lake view with a varied forest in autumn foliage reflected on the water
Photo of a forest meadow with varied grasses and underbrush, with pine and white beech trees in summer foliage in the background
Photo of Myrtle Lake view with large pine trees on the shoreline and a wooded peninsula in the distance
Photo of a log cabin and porch with a picnic table in a setting of mature pine trees
Photo of a column of hikers, some with walking sticks, following a trail edged by white beech in summer foliage
Photo of a column of park visitors snowshoeing on a snow-covered trail through a stand of mature pines
Photo of a lake inlet surrounded by reeds, underbrush, and varied trees in autumn foliage; in the foreground, a young woman with a ponytail looks across the lake over the dead limbs of a fallen tree
Photo of a tall, lone white pine tree framed by coniferous trees in the foreground with an open view of a lake in the distance surrounded by a varied forest
Photo of a lone male hiker wearing a shoulder bag and walking on a woodland trail with tall pines, varied trees in summer foliage, and underbrush to either side
Photo of a narrow, uphill trail covered with leaves, crisscrossed by a pair of fallen tree limbs, and surrounded by oaks in autumn foliage
Photo of a wide, leaf-covered trail surrounded by young maples in early autumn foliage and marked by a sign warning of hilly conditions
Photo of a male hiker, wearing a hat, surrounded by tall underbrush and saplings in autumn foliage, observing a stand of mature white pines in the background
Photo of a round, sawblade-shaped sign in honor of Roy Hemmerich, who once operated a sawmill on this site, with several buildings in the background
Photo of an expansive view of Lake Itasca, with wooded Schoolcraft Island in the distance and grassy shallows in the foreground
Photo of a lake inlet with driftwood along the shoreline and coniferous and deciduous trees in autumn foliage in the background
Photo of the cab of a tall observation tower, with its caged stairway viewed through tree limbs in autumn foliage

Photo of the view from one of the fire tower%u2019s four caged windows, showing the forest canopy in summer foliage and a lake in the background, as well as forest stretching to the horizon under passing clouds
Photo of a guitarist performing for an audience seated in an outdoor amphitheater consisting of benches on an open lawn in a forest clearing
Photo of a creek running through an open pine forest clearing covered with various grasses, long-stemmed plants, and wildflowers under an open sky with clouds
Photo of a bench on a boardwalk trail that traverses a bog with various wetland plants and wildflowers, and tamarack trees in summer foliage in the distance
Photo of a forest trail skirting a clearing once occupied by a deer fence, with mature pine trees on one side and sapling white pines on the other
Photo of Douglas Lodge%u2019s exterior in a setting of tall pines, with the lights from the dining room illuminating the early evening
Photo of the Douglas Lodge lounge, showing its rustic log construction and restored furniture, including wicker tables, a rocking chair, and a roll-top desk
Photo of the Douglas Lodge exterior showing the welcome sign, the side of the lodge with its massive stone chimney, and the mature pines that surround the structure
Photo of the exterior of Forest Inn, showing its stone walls and timber roof as well as paved walkways, lawns, benches, and the surrounding pines
Photo of Forest Inn%u2019s main hall, showing its timber roof beams and massive stone fireplace as well as several rows of folding tables and chairs arranged for a meeting
Photo of a rustic log-constructed building with a green outdoor lamp, an American flag windsock, and signs identifying it as the office of and entrance to the Mississippi Headwaters Hostel
Photo of the rustic, log-constructed Historic East Cabin and its grounds accessed by boardwalks and consisting of a main cabin with a detached, screened-in porch, picnic table, and fire pit
Photo of a snow-covered trail with a low, wooden post-and-rail barrier protecting an Indian mound and mature forest in the background
Photo of a boat landing, with reeds and Lake Itasca in the distance and orange kayaks on a rack in the foreground
Photo of a paved path leading to a one-story rustic log building and a sign identifying it as the Lakeside Museum
Photo of a round, sawblade-shaped sign in honor of Roy Hemmerich, who once operated a sawmill on this site, with several buildings in the background
Photo of exhibits inside Jacob V. Brower Visitor Center, with a pine railing and signage protecting a stuffed black bear in the foreground
Photo of the Jacob V. Brower Visitor Center%u2019s interior, showing a meeting room with chairs, tables, and an overhead projector displaying an informational presentation
Photo of Lake Itasca and surrounding wooded shoreline at sunset
Photo of a timbered building with a wood-beam arch, metal globe structure, deep roof sheltering exhibits, and sign identifying it as the Mary Gibbs Mississippi Headwaters Center
Photo of a wide, paved path with coniferous trees and deciduous trees in autumn foliage on either side and a trail marker sign indicating that the Mississippi River headwaters are 600 feet away
Photo of three young girls, a boy, and a woman standing on an observation platform admiring the trunk of a giant tree
Photo of a tall red pine that dwarfs the trees around it despite its missing top
Photo of a multi-generational group of park visitors climbing on and wading near rocks; a sign in the foreground identifies the location as the headwaters of the Mississippi River
Photo of a historical marker titled %u201CSearch for the Mississippi%u2019s Source%u201D with pine trees in the background
Photo of Lake Itasca%u2019s forested shoreline at dusk, with a line of rocks marking the headwaters of the Mississippi River
Photo of a rustic log cabin, with a porch and picnic table, and a female hiker sitting in one of two rustic wooden chairs in the sunlight under mature pine trees
Photo of a path with wooden railings leading to a small, single-story cabin built with enormous timbers on a stone foundation; a trail sign identifies it as %u201COld Timer%u2019s Cabin%u201D
Photo of two park visitors taking in the sunset across Lake Itasca; the forested shoreline is reflected in the water
Photo of a small, wooded, lakeside cemetery surrounded by an ornamental iron fence; a large headstone bears the Wegmann name
Photo of a stand of tall, old-growth red pines with a trail sign in the foreground identifying the location as Preachers%u2019 Grove
Photo of a column of children in summer clothes, surrounded by tall pine trees, running down a path leading to a lake
Photo of a commemorative plaque mounted to a boulder on a hill, with a cabin and pines in the background
Photo of a tree in autumn foliage and a sign that reads %u201CUniversity of Minnesota Biological Station Since 1909%u201D
Photo of a fenced-in area containing the ruins of a nineteenth-century general store and post office; in the background is a replica of the original Wegmann store
Photo of a replica of the log-constructed Wegmann general store and post office, with a rustic wooden door and window shutters
Photo of a paved road curving through a mature pine forest
Photo of a snow-covered road, with ski tracks, between a pine forest and a frozen lake
Photo of a pine forest and a sign identifying the location as the Itasca State Park Wilderness Sanctuary
Photo of a forested lakeside in autumn, with a hiker sitting in a clearing on a rustic log bench by a fire pit
A photo of a white RV parked next to a picnic bench and fire pit under deciduous trees
Photo of a hand-operated water pump and picnic tables, with a screened-in shelter and pines in the background
A photo of wheeled carts, firepits, and picnic tables under big pines, with a camp building in the background
Photo of a water can, child%u2019s bicycle, and a large blue, yellow, and white dome tent in a pine forest campsite
Photo of an open wooden shelter stocked with shrink-wrapped bundles of firewood for sale
Photo of the rear of the Campground Registration Office, with large ice chests on either side of a roll-up door
Photo of a purified water and ice vending station on the snow-covered grounds of the Campground Registration Office
Photo of the exterior of a one-room log cabin in a forested campsite
Photo of the interior of a one-room log cabin showing a stone fireplace, sofa, dining table and chairs, and washroom
Photo of the exterior of the Campground Registration Office with an outdoor service window, sign listing campground rules and fees, informational placards, and a beverage vending machine
Photo of a log cabin exterior with a grass lawn and picnic tables and a wooded area in the distance
Photo of a log cabin interior with a sofa and table, dresser and lamp, and a large stone fireplace with a pine bough on the mantel
Photo of the exterior of a four-unit log cabin and a walkway leading to four separate screen door entrances
Photo of a log cabin studio unit furnished with a queen-size bed and quilted spread, easy chair, writing desk with lamp, and stone fireplace
Photo of the exterior of a log cabin with a stone chimney nestled under tall pines
Photo of a log cabin%u2019s interior, showing a sitting area with a sofa and chair and a large stone fireplace
Photo of a two-story log lodge and a man in the shade created by the large balcony on the second floor
Photo of the interior of a Douglas Lodge bedroom, showing the wood floors, antique furniture, quilt-covered double bed, and the entrance to the washroom
Photo of the Douglas Lodge exterior showing the welcome sign, the side of the lodge with its massive stone chimney, and the mature pines that surround the structure
Photo of the rustic, log-constructed Historic East Cabin and its grounds accessed by boardwalks and consisting of a main cabin with a detached, screened-in porch, picnic table, and fire pit
Photo of the interior of the Historic East Cabin, with varnished log walls, stone fireplace, sofa and table, rocking chair, and the entrances to the bedrooms
Photo of a rustic log-constructed building with a green outdoor lamp, an American flag windsock, and signs identifying it as the office of and entrance to the Mississippi Headwaters Hostel
Photo of the Headwaters Hostel living room, with a large stone fireplace, tall lamps, and comfortable chairs and sofa
Photo of the two-story Clubhouse%u2019s exterior, with an ornate mansard roof and screened-in porch
Photo of the Clubhouse%u2019s interior with varnished log walls, large stone fireplace, wrap-around sofa, and staircase leading up to the second-floor balcony and bedrooms
Photo of a large, modern log building in a snow-covered, wooded setting
Photo of a unit with two double beds covered with quilts, a dresser and mirror, a writing desk, and other furnishings
Photo of a cabin with a stone foundation and chimney and a screened-in porch; a child%u2019s bicycle and two trail bikes are parked outside and a blue canoe with paddles lies in the foreground
Photo of the cabin%u2019s living room with a stone fireplace, two sofas, a dining table and chairs, and other furnishings

Photo of a low wooden building with a metal roof, identified as a bike and boat rental office with a repair shop; various kinds of hybrid bicycles, child trailers, and accessories are parked outside along with a large yellow kayak

Photo of the exterior of the Jacob V. Brower Visitor Center, showing a modern, rustic-style building with twin clapboard-sheathed chimneys above an angular roof and twin columns flanking the entrance, where a poster advertises a park event

Photo of the exterior of the Jacob V. Brower Visitor Center, showing a modern, rustic-style building with twin clapboard-sheathed chimneys above an angular roof and twin columns flanking the entrance, where a poster advertises a park event

Photo of the entrance to Douglas Lodge showing tall pines, the lodge%u2019s log construction and stone chimney, and a large second-floor balcony; a woman and two children in summer clothes walk along a paved path to the front doors
Photo of the exterior of the Campground Registration Office with an outdoor service window, sign listing campground rules and fees, informational placards, and a beverage vending machine
Photo of the exterior of the Campground Registration Office with an outdoor service window, sign listing campground rules and fees, informational placards, and a beverage vending machine

Photo of an outdoor seating area at the Headwaters Cafe, with a paved patio surrounded by low stone walls and octagonal picnic tables under a large trussed roof; a woman sits at one table with a bottle of water, and a man stands in the background near a pair of entry doors
Photo of the dining room at Douglas Lodge showing its large windows, ornate vintage lighting, wood beams and paneling, and table settings
Photo of a paved road passing a park entrance with a stone-and-timber signpost and a hanging sign with the words %u201CItasca State Park%u201D inside the shape of the state of Minnesota

Photo of the stone wall and timbered doors at the entrance to the Forest Inn Trading Post gift shop; a fixture with a selection of Itasca State Park t-shirts and fleecewear is to the right of the entrance and various other retail displays are visible through the open doors
Photo of the gift shop at the Jacob V. Brower Visitor Center, with displays of souvenirs, handicrafts, and nature books; t-shirts and fleecewear hang in the background
Photo of the gift shop at Mary Gibbs Mississippi Headwaters Center, displaying racks of sunglasses, handicrafts, souvenirs, hats, t-shirts, and educational toys
Photo of exhibits inside Jacob V. Brower Visitor Center, with a pine railing and signage protecting a stuffed black bear in the foreground
Photo of the interior of the Lakeside Museum with timber frames supporting chronologically arranged panels that describe Lake Itasca-area history

Photo of a man and woman in winter clothes reading interpretive panels under the sheltering roof of the Mary Gibbs Mississippi Headwaters Center; snow-covered grounds and pine trees are in the background
Photo of a uniformed female Minnesota Department of Natural Resources naturalist leading an outdoor talk and demonstration for several men and women on a lawn under pine trees

Photo of a uniformed female Minnesota Department of Natural Resources naturalist leading an outdoor activity with a group of boys and girls sitting at a picnic table in front of tubs of yellow and blue modeling clay; a woman stands nearby taking photographs
Photo of a V-shaped path leading to a stone restroom building with facilities for men and women; tall pine trees stand in the background
Photo of two women riding hybrid bicycles on a paved bike trail with big trees to either side; both wear safety helmets
Photo of two kayaks and a paddle boat on a lake with reeds in the foreground and a forested shoreline in the distance
Photo of four paddlers in canoes following a water trail that passes between clumps of wetland vegetation including reeds and cattails
Photo of a small, screened-in wooden building with a sign that identifies it as a %u201Cfish cleaning house%u201D
Photo of a T-shaped wooden pier with railings and two men fishing from its far end; reeds grow in the foreground and pine trees line the far shoreline
Photo of a T-shaped wooden pier with railings and a man fishing from the far end; vegetation in the foreground and trees along the far shoreline glow with autumn foliage

Photo of a uniformed male Minnesota Department of Natural Resources officer showing a young girl in a pink and blue life preserver how to fish with a rod and reel; they stand on a wooden dock with other park visitors, and pine trees are visible in the distance

Photo of a low wooden building with a metal roof, identified as a bike and boat rental office with a repair shop; various kinds of hybrid bicycles, child trailers, and accessories are parked outside along with a large yellow kayak
Photo of children playing at a wooded campsite playground with slides, swings, monkey bars, and other attractions
Photo of a picnic basket, decorative woman%u2019s handbag, and a single green flip-flop on a green lawn
Photo of adults and children enjoying a picnic served from coolers and folding tables under the overhang of a rustic log shelter; a fire pit is in the foreground
Photo of a lantern-lit sidewalk leading to the snow-covered Jacob V. Brower Visitor Center at night; the modern building%u2019s twin chimneys tower above an angular roof
Photo of a seated man, wearing a baseball-style cap and parka, fishing through a hole in the ice on a snow-covered lake with a forested shoreline in the background
Photo of a male cross-country skier, pushing himself along with a pair of ski poles, on a snow-covered path with pine trees to either side
Photo of a man in a black and red snowsuit, helmet, and gloves, operating a snowmobile on a snow-covered path with trees in the background
Photo of a column of visitors, wearing heavy winter clothes and snowshoes, walking in single file across a frozen lake close to the shore under a cloudy sky

Vintage photograph of a 1910s gathering at Douglas Lodge showing a large crowd of well-dressed men and women posing in front of the log building and on its balcony, with several early automobiles parked on the entrance driveway
Photo of a twin-decked Corban%u2019s Cruises boat and passengers on lake with an American flag flying on the stern and a pine forest on the shoreline in the background
Photo of a uniformed female Minnesota Department of Natural Resources naturalist leading an outdoor talk and demonstration for several men and women on a lawn under pine trees

Photo of a uniformed female Minnesota Department of Natural Resources naturalist leading an outdoor activity with a group of boys and girls sitting at a picnic table in front of tubs of yellow and blue modeling clay; a woman stands nearby taking photographs
Photo of a log-built bathhouse and sand-covered swimming beach, with adult and child bathers by a lake surrounded by pine trees
